item.title: Abc Notation
item.description: In this post, we will generate sheet music for bones using abc notation, and incorporate it into your everyday note taking by leveraging a powerful note taking app, HackMD.. Sheet music from text If you’re reading this, you probably already know how to write sheet music and have your own software of choice to do the job on your device. So why abc? abc notation isn’t necessarily a competitor to those software. Rather than being a tool dedicated to laying out professional looking scores, I see it as a solution for inserting sheet music into regular text files.
